overview: Ufuk and Ömer are two imaginative brothers, 10-11 years old, living with their parents in a rural area near the border. One day, they see a documentary about fishermen on TV and they set out to make their own fishing rods. But to fish, they have to reach the lake beyond the border. Meanwhile, their father, Mesut, is troubled by financial difficulties that are limiting his and his family's lives, and he accepts an illegal job he thought he would never do to improve their situation. In parallel, the motivations of fathers and sons, who are trying to find their own way to overcome their limits, are very different from each other and their jobs are not easy at all.
title: HAD
